description:
This course will teach you Math tricks to increase the speed of your calculations with accurate results. It helps you focus on main problem rather than wasting energy on performing calculations like multiply , divide , square root, cube root, addition ...Ideal for students 13 years and above. Especially for those preparing for competitive exams. The videos are ordered to help understand the concepts clearly.

Topics covered in this course:

Special Squaring formula and Squaring general formula

Mental calculation of squares from 1 to 25 which will enable calc. square of numbers from 26 to 125.

Squaring of 3 digit number.

Multiply combinations from 11*11 to 19*19 quickly.

Base Technique for doing accurate multiplication quickly.

Quick Cubing technique.

Quick Cube Root technique.

Special formula of Division and general formula of division.

Quick Decimal division and square root by visualization.

Result Verification Technique is taught along with all the sessions.

You would be able to apply Result Verification Technique in addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, squares, cubes, square roots and cube roots etc.
title: Quick Math
